description: '''Jon Weber''' (born 1961, [[Milwaukee, Wisconsin]]) is a [[New York City]] and [[Chicago]]-based [[jazz]] [[piano|pianist]] and composer  whose compositions and performances have met critical and popular acclaim in many countries around the world. Largely self-taught, Weber has [[Absolute pitch|perfect pitch]] and remarkable melodic recall. He serves as host of ''[[Piano Jazz|Piano Jazz With Jon Weber]]'' on [[National Public Radio|NPR]].
